targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(concat(YEAR(now()),'-',Month(T1.TIMESTAMP),'-01'),'%Y-%c-%d')) as time,
  "Mittel" AS metric,
  avg(T1.value) as value
FROM(
SELECT
  TIMESTAMP,
  sum(PV_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
GROUP BY YEAR(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)) T1
GROUP BY month(T1.TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
   UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(concat(YEAR(now()),'-',Month(TIMESTAMP),'-01'),'%Y-%c-%d')) as time,
  convert(YEAR(TIMESTAMP), char) AS metric,
  sum(PV_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
GROUP BY YEAR(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
   UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(concat(YEAR(now()),'-',Month(T1.TIMESTAMP),'-01'),'%Y-%c-%d')) as time,
  "Mittel" AS metric,
  avg(T1.value)/7.68 as value
FROM(
SELECT
  TIMESTAMP,
  sum(PV_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
GROUP BY YEAR(TIMESTAMP),month(TIMESTAMP)) T1
GROUP BY month(T1.TIMESTAMP)
